languages.text: "Взаимодействие с образцами священной технологии мирянами, не посвященными в духовенство Омниссии, является богохульством восьмой категории. Уличающее свидетельство единицы, именуемой "старая Ризза", сохранено для использования в дальнейшем разбирательстве о свершении греховных деяний".

"The handling of sacred technology by laypersons uninitiated in the Omnissiah's priesthood is a Category Eight blasphemy. Incriminating evidence of profane acts perpetrated by the unit named 'old Ryzza' has been recorded for use in future judicial proceedings."
languages.original_text: "Взаимодействие с образцами священной технологии мирянами, не посвященными в духовенство Омниссии, является богохульством восьмой категории. Уличающее свидетельство единицы, именуемой "старая Ризза", сохранено для использования в дальнейшем разбирательстве о свершении греховных деяний".

traits.locale_text: "The handling of sacred technology by laypersons uninitiated in the Omnissiah's priesthood is a category eight blasphemy. Incriminating evidence of sinful acts perpetrated by the unit named 'old Ryzza' has been recorded for use in future judicial proceedings."

"The handling of sacred technology by laypersons uninitiated in the Omnissiah's priesthood is a category eight blasphemy. Incriminating evidence of sinful acts perpetrated by the unit named 'old Ryzza' has been recorded for use in future judicial proceedings."

"The handling of sacred technology by laypersons uninitiated in the Omnissiah's priesthood is a category eight blasphemy. Incriminating evidence of sinful acts perpetrated by the unit named 'old Ryzza' has been recorded for use in future judicial proceedings."

"The handling of sacred technology by laypersons uninitiated in the Omnissiah's priesthood is a Category Eight blasphemy. Incriminating evidence of profane acts perpetrated by the unit named 'old Ryzza' has been recorded for use in future judicial proceedings."

languages.text: “没有在欧姆尼塞亚名下担任神职的普通人处理神圣的技术，属于第八类亵渎行为。名为‘老莱萨’的个体所犯下的罪行，其罪证已经被记录下来，以便在未来的司法程序中使用。”
languages.original_text: "The handling of sacred technology by laypersons uninitiated in the Omnissiah's priesthood is a Category Eight blasphemy. Incriminating evidence of profane acts perpetrated by the unit named 'old Ryzza' has been recorded for use in future judicial proceedings."

traits.locale_text: “没有在欧姆尼塞亚名下担任神职的普通人处理神圣的技术，属于第八种亵渎行为。名为‘老莱萨’的个体所犯下的罪行，其罪证已经被记录下来，以便在未来的司法程序中使用。”

languages.text: «La manipulación de tecnología sagrada por personas laicas no iniciadas en el sacerdocio del Omnissiah es una blasfemia de categoría ocho. Se han registrado pruebas de los actos profanos de la unidad "vieja Ryzza" para su uso en procesos judiciales posteriores».
languages.original_text: "The handling of sacred technology by laypersons uninitiated in the Omnissiah's priesthood is a Category Eight blasphemy. Incriminating evidence of profane acts perpetrated by the unit named 'old Ryzza' has been recorded for use in future judicial proceedings."

traits.locale_text: «La manipulación de tecnología sagrada por personas laicas no iniciadas en el sacerdocio del Omnissiah es una blasfemia de categoría ocho. Se han registrado pruebas de los actos pecaminosos de la unidad "vieja Ryzza" para su uso en procesos judiciales posteriores».

languages.text: 「万機神の聖職に携わっていない素人が神聖な技術を扱うことは、第8級の冒涜行為に分類される。『リザ様』と名付けられたユニットが犯した冒涜的行為の証拠は、将来的な司法手続きで使用するために記録した」
languages.original_text: "The handling of sacred technology by laypersons uninitiated in the Omnissiah's priesthood is a Category Eight blasphemy. Incriminating evidence of profane acts perpetrated by the unit named 'old Ryzza' has been recorded for use in future judicial proceedings."

traits.locale_text: 「万機神の聖職に携わっていない素人が神聖な技術を扱うことは、第8級の冒涜行為に分類される。『リザ様』と名付けられたユニットが犯した冒涜的行為の証拠は、将来的な司法手続きで使用するために記録した」

languages.text: "Der Umgang mit heiliger Technologie durch Laien, die nicht Mitglieder der Priesterschaft von Omnissiah sind, ist eine Blasphemie der Kategorie 8. Belastende Beweise für gottloses Handeln durch die Einheit 'Alte Ryzza' wurden für künftige Gerichtsverfahren aufgezeichnet."
languages.original_text: "The handling of sacred technology by laypersons uninitiated in the Omnissiah's priesthood is a Category Eight blasphemy. Incriminating evidence of profane acts perpetrated by the unit named 'old Ryzza' has been recorded for use in future judicial proceedings."

traits.locale_text: "Der Umgang mit heiliger Technologie durch Laien, die nicht Mitglieder der Priesterschaft von Omnissiah sind, ist eine Blasphemie der Kategorie 8. Belastende Beweise für sündhaftes Handeln durch die Einheit 'Alte Ryzza' wurden für künftige Gerichtsverfahren aufgezeichnet."

languages.text: « La manipulation de technologies sacrées par des profanes non-initiés au sacerdoce de l'Omnimessie est un blasphème de catégorie huit. Les preuves accablantes d'actes profanes commis par l'unité nommée "Ryzza" ont été enregistrées pour un usage ultérieur dans le cadre de procédures judiciaires. »
languages.original_text: "The handling of sacred technology by laypersons uninitiated in the Omnissiah's priesthood is a Category Eight blasphemy. Incriminating evidence of profane acts perpetrated by the unit named 'old Ryzza' has been recorded for use in future judicial proceedings."

traits.locale_text: « La manipulation de technologies sacrées par des profanes non-initiés au sacerdoce de l'Omnimessie est un blasphème de catégorie huit. Les preuves accablantes d'actes impies commis par l'unité nommée "Ryzza" ont été enregistrées pour un usage ultérieur dans le cadre de procédures judiciaires. »

languages.text: "Hermesih rahibi olmayanların kutsal teknolojilere el sürmesi, Sekizinci Kategori dine aykırılıktır. 'Koca Ryzza' adındaki birimin kutsala saygısızlık eylemlerinin suçlayıcı delilleri, gelecekte adli bir kovuşturmada kullanılmak üzere kayıtlara geçirildi."
languages.original_text: "The handling of sacred technology by laypersons uninitiated in the Omnissiah's priesthood is a Category Eight blasphemy. Incriminating evidence of profane acts perpetrated by the unit named 'old Ryzza' has been recorded for use in future judicial proceedings."

traits.locale_text: "Hermesih rahibi olmayan kişilerin kutsal teknolojilere el sürmesi, Sekizinci Kategori bir küfürdür. 'Koca Ryzza' adındaki birimin kutsala saygısızlık eylemlerinin suçlayıcı delilleri, gelecekte adli bir kovuşturmada kullanılmak üzere kaydedildi."
